# systems.builtin.deterministic.continuous.LinearSystem2D { #cdesym.systems.builtin.deterministic.continuous.LinearSystem2D }

```python
systems.builtin.deterministic.continuous.LinearSystem2D(*args, **kwargs)
```

Two-dimensional linear system.

Dynamics:
    dx1/dt = a11*x1 + a12*x2 + b1*u
    dx2/dt = a21*x1 + a22*x2 + b2*u

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type   | Description               | Default    |
|--------|--------|---------------------------|------------|
| a11    | float  | State matrix coefficients | _required_ |
| a12    | float  | State matrix coefficients | _required_ |
| a21    | float  | State matrix coefficients | _required_ |
| a22    | float  | State matrix coefficients | _required_ |
| b1     | float  | Control gain coefficients | _required_ |
| b2     | float  | Control gain coefficients | _required_ |

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```python
>>> # Stable spiral
>>> system = LinearSystem2D(
...     a11=-1, a12=2, a21=-2, a22=-1, b1=1, b2=0
... )
>>> eigenvalues = np.linalg.eigvals(np.array([[-1, 2], [-2, -1]]))
>>> # λ = -1 ± 2j (stable spiral)
```
